							<span class="column-product-subtitle">
								<?=item.subTitle?>
							</span>
							
								<span class="column-product-price">
									<?  var separatedSalePrice = JSON.parse(item.separatedSalePrice);
										var separatedStandartPrice = JSON.parse(item.separatedStandartPrice);
									?>
									<span <? if (separatedStandartPrice) { ?> class="column-product-price-new"<? } ?>>
										<?
											for(var j = 0; j < separatedSalePrice.length; j++) {
												var salePriceItem = separatedSalePrice[j];
										?>
											<span class="<?=(salePriceItem.isCurrency) ? 'currency-sign' : 'sale-price'?>">
												<?=salePriceItem.value?>
											</span>
										<? } ?>
									</span>
									<? if (separatedStandartPrice) { ?>
										<span class="column-product-price-old">
										<?
											for(var k = 0; k < separatedStandartPrice.length; k++) {
												var standartPriceItem = separatedStandartPrice[k];
										?>
											<span class="<?=(standartPriceItem.isCurrency) ? 'currency-sign' : 'sale-price'?>">
												<?=standartPriceItem.value?>
											</span>
										<? } ?>
										</span>
									<? } ?>
								</span>
							
							
								<?
									var avgRating = Math.round(item.rating);
									var percentage = Math.round(avgRating / numberOfStars * 100);
								?>
								<!-- rating -->
								<? if(percentage) { ?>
									<div class="rating-stars-container">
										<ul class="rating-stars rating-stars-empty"><? for( var star = 0; star < numberOfStars; star ++ ) { ?><li></li><? } ?></ul>
										<ul class="rating-stars rating-stars-filled" style="width:<?=percentage?>%;"><? for( var star = 0; star <  numberOfStars; star ++ ) { ?><li></li><? } ?></ul>
									</div>
								<? } ?>
								<!-- /rating -->
								<span class="rating-stars-count"><?=item.reviews?></span>
							
						</span>
					</a>
                </li>
            <? } ?>
            </ul>
        </div>
		<? } ?>
		</div>
	<? } ?>
 </script>

	</div>

<h2>Pharrell Williams Hu Holi NMD BC Shoes</h2>


<h4>Inspired by a Hindu festival, artist Pharrell Williams designs these shoes.</h4>


<div class="product-details-description clearfix">
<div class="prod-details para-small" itemprop="description">


The adidas Originals Hu Collection showcases Pharrell Williams' creative flair for celebrating human diversity. These men's shoes bring modern style to the streets with a modern sock-like knit upper. Riding on a responsive Boost midsole that helps return energy to your step during urban adventures.


</div>

<ul class="bullets_list para-small">

<li>Boost is our most responsive cushioning ever</li>

<li>Breathable knit upper</li>

<li>Molded EVA midsole plugs for the signature NMD aesthetic</li>

<li>TPU midfoot cage; Sock-like construction</li>

<li>Two-color laces</li>

<li>Printed sockliner</li>

<li>Main materials: Textile and leather upper / Textile lining / Rubber outsole</li>

<li>Imported</li>

</ul>

</div>

</div>

	background-color: transparent;
}
.olapic .olapic-wall-widget .olapic-widget-main-loading {
	position: absolute;
	z-index: 1; 
	right: 0;
	bottom: 2px;
	left: 0;
	width: 50px;
	height: 50px;
	margin: auto;
	display: none;
	transition: all .2s ease;
}
.olapic .olapic-wall-widget .loading-graph {
	position: relative;
	top: calc(50% - 2.5px);
	left: calc(50% - 2.5px);
	width: 5px;
	height: 5px;
	border-radius: 50px;
}
.olapic .olapic-wall-widget .loading-graph::before {
	position: absolute;
	top: -20px;
	width: 20px;
	height: 20px;
	content: '';
	-webkit-transform-origin: 0 100%;
	-ms-transform-origin: 0 100%;
	transform-origin: 0 100%;
	-webkit-animation: loading-graph 1.5s linear infinite;
	animation: loading-graph 1.5s linear infinite; 
	border-top: 3px solid #4d4e4d;
	border-right: 3px solid #4d4e4d;
	border-radius: 0 50px 0 0;
}
.olapic .olapic-wall-widget .loading-graph::after {
	position: absolute;
	top: 3px;
	right: 3px;
	width: 20px;
	height: 20px;
	content: '';
	-webkit-transform-origin: 100% 0;
	-ms-transform-origin: 100% 0;
	transform-origin: 100% 0;
	-webkit-animation: loading-graph 1.5s linear infinite;
	animation: loading-graph 1.5s linear infinite; 
	border-bottom: 3px solid #4d4e4d;
	border-left: 3px solid #4d4e4d;
	border-radius: 0 0 0 50px;
}

	border: 0;

@-webkit-keyframes loading-graph {
	0% {
		-webkit-transform: rotate(0deg);
		transform: rotate(0deg);
	}

	100% {
		-webkit-transform: rotate(360deg);
		transform: rotate(360deg);
	}
}

@keyframes loading-graph {
	0% {
		-webkit-transform: rotate(0deg);
		transform: rotate(0deg);
	}

	100% {
		-webkit-transform: rotate(360deg);
		transform: rotate(360deg);
	}
}

    if (--times < 0) {
        if (typeof failHandler === 'function') {

    }
    if (toCheckHandler()) {
        toDoHandler();
        return;
    }

    }, interval);
};

(function() {
    function fire_pixel(transactionParams) {
        Krux('require:http').pixel({
            url: '//beacon.krxd.net/transaction.gif',
            data: transactionParams
        });
    }

    function date_from_string(date_string) {
        if (!Date.parse(date_string)) return;
        var date_obj = new Date(date_string),
            year = date_obj.getFullYear() + '-',
            day = date_obj.getDate(),
            month = date_obj.getMonth() + 1;

        month = (month < 9) ? '0' + month + '-' : month + '-';
        day = (day < 9) ? '0' + day : day;

        var date = year + month + day;
        return date;
    }
    function krux_to_string(idx) {
        var tmp = Krux('scrape.js_global', idx) || [];
        if (typeof(tmp) === 'string') {
            return tmp;
        } else {
            return tmp.join();
        }
    }

    var transInfo = {};

    var pickupParams = ['customer_city', 'customer_country', 'customer_payment_type', 'customer_shipping_method',
        'is_customizable', 'order_gift_card_amount', 'order_level_discount', 'order_pre_discount_amount', /* 'order_subtotal',*/
        'product_brand', 'product_category', 'product_collection', 'product_color', 'product_gender', 'product_group',
        'product_line_style', 'product_model_id', 'product_name', 'product_personalization',
        'product_price_type', 'product_purchase_type', 'product_quantity', 'product_rating', 'product_reviews',
        'product_size', 'product_sku', 'product_sport', 'product_status', 'product_type', 'product_video', 'signup_step'
    ];
    var priceParams = [
        ['product_price', 'page.product.price'],
        ['order_subtotal', 'user.order_subtotal'],
        ['order_total', 'user.order_total'],
        ['shipping_total', 'user.shipping_total']
    ];

    transInfo.price = Krux('scrape.js_global', 'utag_data.order_subtotal_eur');
    transInfo.quantity = Krux('scrape.js_global', 'utag_data.total_products');
    transInfo.date = date_from_string(Krux('scrape.js_global', 'utag_data.order_time'));
    transInfo.site_name = Krux('scrape.js_global', 'utag_data.site_name') || 'none';
    for (i = 0; i < pickupParams.length; i++) {
        transInfo[pickupParams[i]] = krux_to_string('utag_data.' + pickupParams[i]);
    }
    for (i = 0; i < priceParams.length; i++) {
        transInfo[priceParams[i][0]] = krux_to_string('krux_data.' + priceParams[i][1]);
    }
    var order_id = Krux('scrape.js_global', 'krux_data.user.order_id');

    transInfo._kpid = Krux('get', 'pubid');

    if (transInfo.price && transInfo.quantity && transInfo.date && order_id) {
        fire_pixel(transInfo);
    }

})();
